DOC.brief_summary: A clinical study to evaluate the effect of a commercial mouth rinse on plaque re-growth
DOC.brief_title: Effect of a Commercial Cosmetic Mouth Rinse on Plaque Re-growth
DOC.criteria: Good general and oral health At least 20 natural gradable teeth Mean plaque score (Turesky Modification of the Quigley Hein Index) of greater than or equal to 2.00 at the first baseline visit
